channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 13 Best Fitness and Workout Apps for 2026, Tested & Reviewed
item.description: These fitness apps will help you turn New Year's resolutions into real results.

item.title: Stop Using Your Keyboard and Start Using Handy, a Free Speech-to-Text App
item.description: It’s called Handy, and it uses AI models to accurately convert your speaking voice into text—all for free.

item.title: Blood Feud: Oura’s Health Panels Versus Whoop’s Advanced Labs
item.description: It’s easier than ever to order your own blood draws, but direct-access testing won’t replace a doctor.

item.title: How to Manage Files on iOS and Android
item.description: You have more access to your phone’s file system than you may think.

item.title: Framework Laptop 16 (RTX 5070) Review: A Dream Come True
item.description: With upgradable graphics, the Framework Laptop 16 achieves what PC nerds have only ever dreamed of.

item.title: India orders Musk’s X to fix Grok over ‘obscene’ AI content
item.description: India's IT ministry has given X 72 hours to submit an action-taken report.
